## MINIMUM\_REDEMPTION\_RATE variable

Value that the [redemption rate](./arth-lib-base.fees.redemptionrate.md) will never decay below.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
MINIMUM_REDEMPTION_RATE: Decimal
```
